name: Clearwater Paper Corporation
description: Clearwater Paper Corporation is a leading manufacturer of quality paper products, specializing in the production of consumer and commercial paper goods. Founded in 2008 and headquartered in Spokane, Washington, Clearwater Paper operates two primary business segments: Consumer Products and Pulp & Paperboard. The Consumer Products segment includes a wide range of products such as bathroom tissue, paper towels, and other paper products that are marketed under various brand names. The Pulp & Paperboard segment focuses on producing high-quality pulp and paperboard products for various applications. Clearwater Paper is committed to sustainability and responsible sourcing, utilizing renewable resources and employing environmentally friendly practices in its operations. The company emphasizes innovation and quality, striving to meet the evolving needs of its customers in a competitive marketplace. Clearwater Paper's dedication to operational excellence and customer satisfaction has positioned it as a trusted partner in the paper products industry, serving retailers, wholesalers, and food service companies across North America. With a strong focus on sustainability and community engagement, Clearwater Paper is not only committed to delivering superior products but also to positively impacting the communities it serves.

seo.meta_title: Clearwater Paper Corporation | Quality Paper Products Manufacturer
seo.meta_description: Explore Clearwater Paper Corporation, a leading manufacturer of consumer and commercial paper products committed to sustainability and quality.

faq.question: What products does Clearwater Paper manufacture?
faq.answer: Clearwater Paper manufactures bathroom tissue, paper towels, napkins, pulp, and paperboard products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Clearwater Paper?
faq.answer: Arnie H. H. Kahn is the CEO of Clearwater Paper Corporation.

faq.question: Where is Clearwater Paper headquartered?
faq.answer: Clearwater Paper is headquartered in Spokane, Washington, USA.
